alert.note: Alert for Northeast Aroostook; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 10:22PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aroostook County through 1100 PM EDT... At 1022 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Madawaska Lake, or 11 miles east of Eagle Lake, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Madawaska, Van Buren, New Canada, Lille, Madawaska Lake, Cross Lake, New Sweden, Grand Isle, Connor, Stockholm, Hamlin, Westmanland, Sinclair, Guerette, Saint Agatha and Cyr Plantation. This includes US Highway 1 between Van Buren and Grand Isle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
